meta.content: Distance Learning Update!
Breakthrough Schools | Explore Top-Rated Public K-8 Elementary & Middle Schools in Cleveland
Breakthrough Schools

div.p: Hello Families! We officially launch our new Distance Learning Portal this morning!! We are using Google Classroom to do virtual “school”. This week is all about getting oriented. Lessons will be posted on Monday and due each Friday. Scholars will get feedback and have touchpoints from their teacher throughout each week. If you haven’t received…

Breakthrough Schools

a.title: Updated Food Pickup Schedule: Tuesday 3/31 and Thursday 4/2

h3.a: Updated Food Pickup Schedule: Tuesday 3/31 and Thursday 4/2

div.p: An important update regarding food pickup this week! We’re trying a new approach that will reduce the number of trips you have to make. You will be able to pick up a FIVE DAY SUPPLY of meals on Tues & Thurs! Here is the new food pickup schedule for the week: NEW FOOD PICKUP SCHEDULE…

a.title: Updated Food Pickup Schedule: Tuesday 3/31 and Thursday 4/2

div.class: pp-content-post pp-content-grid-post pp-grid-default post-5458 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-covid

meta.content: Three Top Tips from Principals During Extended Closure and Remote Learning!
Breakthrough Schools | Explore Top-Rated Public K-8 Elementary & Middle Schools in Cleveland
Breakthrough Schools

a.title: Three Top Tips from Principals During Extended Closure and Remote Learning!

h3.a: Three Top Tips from Principals During Extended Closure and Remote Learning!

div.p: Hi families! While we all continue to adjust to the new world, we have Three Top Tips from our principals. We hope you find these helpful. Hang in there, you got this! 1) Keep it simple. Encourage your scholar to read as much as possible. Any reading counts! 2) 2-3 hours a day of education…

a.title: Three Top Tips from Principals During Extended Closure and Remote Learning!

div.class: pp-content-post pp-content-grid-post pp-grid-default post-5453 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-covid

meta.content: Wednesday Update to All Families
Breakthrough Schools | Explore Top-Rated Public K-8 Elementary & Middle Schools in Cleveland
Breakthrough Schools

div.p: Hello Breakthrough families! Two important updates. FOOD: We are now able to offer both free lunch *and* breakfast for the next day as part of our daily M-F 11:30am-1:30pm food pickup service! EDUCATION: If you were not able to pick up your Distance Learning packet from school yet, please call your school’s front desk and…

a.title: Sunday Update on School Closures, Lunches, and more

h3.a: Sunday Update on School Closures, Lunches, and more

div.p: Dear Breakthrough families — The following two messages were just sent out via our texting and phone services. We will continue to post all communications here on our website as well. Text Message to Families: Dear Breakthrough Families — We are busy doing everything we can to help our entire community manage this unprecedented situation.…

meta.content: Friday Update Regarding School Closures and COVID-19
Breakthrough Schools | Explore Top-Rated Public K-8 Elementary & Middle Schools in Cleveland
Breakthrough Schools

a.title: Friday Update Regarding School Closures and COVID-19

h3.a: Friday Update Regarding School Closures and COVID-19

div.p: Dear Breakthrough Families, As you know, Governor DeWine announced a mandatory three (3) week school closure, effective March, 16, 2020. However, in the interest of safety and preventing the spread of the virus, we are electing to start the mandatory break after school today, Friday, March, 13th. To ensure the seamless delivery of important services…

a.title: Friday Update Regarding School Closures and COVID-19

div.class: pp-content-post pp-content-grid-post pp-grid-default post-5412 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-covid

meta.content: Statewide School Closure Announcements
Breakthrough Schools | Explore Top-Rated Public K-8 Elementary & Middle Schools in Cleveland
Breakthrough Schools

div.p: Governor DeWine has announced a mandatory, statewide 3-week school closure effective Tuesday, March 17 due to COVID-19. Although there have been no confirmed cases in our schools, we are all committed to prevention of this outbreak and as such we will follow our Governor’s and local health officials’ direction. However, we are joining other schools…

div.class: pp-content-post pp-content-grid-post pp-grid-default post-5409 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-covid category-uncategorized-en

meta.content: Breakthrough Covid-19 Coronavirus – Update #2
Breakthrough Schools | Explore Top-Rated Public K-8 Elementary & Middle Schools in Cleveland
Breakthrough Schools

div.p: Updated: March 11, 2020 Dear Breakthrough Community, This week, city and county health officials confirmed three cases of COVID-19 in Cuyahoga County. All three, as well as six close contacts to the patients, have been quarantined at home. As a reminder, the symptoms of COVID-19 are fever, cough and shortness of breath. Please keep children…

div.class: pp-content-post pp-content-grid-post pp-grid-default post-5407 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-covid category-uncategorized-en

meta.content: Breakthrough Response to Covid-19/Coronavirus – Update #1
Breakthrough Schools | Explore Top-Rated Public K-8 Elementary & Middle Schools in Cleveland
Breakthrough Schools

div.p: Dear Breakthrough Community, This week, city and county health officials confirmed three cases of COVID-19 in Cuyahoga County. All three, as well as six close contacts to the patients, have been quarantined at home. As a reminder, the symptoms of COVID-19 are fever, cough and shortness of breath. Please keep children exhibiting these symptoms home…

a.span: ONLINE DISTANCE LEARNING & HOME TECH SUPPORT

div.p: Breakthrough: You can currently pick up a FIVE DAY SUPPLY of meals on every Tuesday and Thursday, 11:30am - 1:00pm, at any Breakthrough school. Breakthrough families can visit any of our campuses for meal pickup.

CMSD: Providing free grab-and-go student lunches at 22 locations M-F to all students in the city regardless of the school they attend. All details and locations available here: CMSD COVID-19 Meal Pickup Locations

hr.p: Families, we have prepared the following "Extended Learning Packet" for you. This packet includes age and grade level appropriate printed, online, and in-person resources.

p.a: Breakthrough Extended Learning Packet - All Grades

a.style: color:#000; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none; word-wrap:break-word;

p.a: Hey #breakthroughfamily! Breakthrough Alumna ‘15 Kayla B. sent us this amazing message of encouragement during these crazy times 🙌🏾💜 Kayla thank you SO MUCH for inspiring all of us! #BreakthroughAlumni #BreakthroughFam #EducationIsUrgent #DistanceLearning #LoveOurAlumni 🙌🏾💜🎓

p.style: color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;

div.p: A post shared by Breakthrough Public Schools (@breakthrough.cle) on Apr 20, 2020 at 9:55am PDT

Breakthrough Schools is a non-profit organization supporting the highest-performing network of free, public charter schools in Cleveland, Ohio. The mission of Breakthrough Schools is to develop a growing network of distinctive school options that prepare Cleveland area students for success in life.

aside.div: Friends of Breakthrough Schools is a non-profit development and advocacy organization. Friends of Breakthrough is responsible for closing the gap in public funding we need to overcome each year, as well as working with community, business, and political leaders to build city-wide support for high-quality public school options for all children in Cleveland.

li.a: E Prep & Village Prep Woodland Hills
